Method Detail

processCollections

public void processCollections(org.kuali.rice.kns.util.OjbCollectionAware template,
                               org.kuali.rice.kns.bo.PersistableBusinessObject orig,
                               org.kuali.rice.kns.bo.PersistableBusinessObject copy)
OJB RemovalAwareLists do not survive through the response/request lifecycle. This method is a work-around to forcibly remove business objects that are found in Collections stored in the database but not in memory.

Parameters:
orig -
id -
template -

OJB RemovalAwareLists do not survive through the response/request lifecycle. This method is a work-around to forcibly remove business objects that are found in Collections stored in the database but not in memory.
